short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Securely share encrypted text via crypt.fyi

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension allows you to quickly encrypt and share text selections using https://crypt.fyi

Features
- Right-click context menu integration
- Secure encryption using crypt.fyi's encryption standards
- Automatic clipboard copying of encrypted URLs
- Desktop notifications for successful encryption and errors

https://github.com/osbytes/crypt.fyi/tree/main/packages/extension
